greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: If n = Product (p_j^k_j), a(n) = numerator of Sum 1/p_j^k_j.
link: Klaus Brockhaus, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: (MAGMA) a028236:=func< k | k eq 1 select 1 else Numerator(&+[ f[i, 1]^-f[i,2]: i in [1..#f] ]) where f is Factorization(k) >; [ a028236(n):n in [1..82] ]; // _Klaus Brockhaus_, Nov 06 2010
a028236 n = sum $ map (div n) $ a141809_row n
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
